critique:
This document is an executive order that waives civil service rules to appoint a widow to a clerical position in the Treasury Department. 

Ideological Tilt: The document is slightly liberal in that it provides a government job to a widow with children who needs support. Score: 1

Immigration Approach: This document has nothing to do with immigration. Score: 0

Executive Power: This document expands executive power by waiving civil service rules. Score: 2

Federalism: This document does not address federalism. Score: 0

National Security vs. Civil Liberties: This document does not address national security or civil liberties. Score: 0

Economic Regulation: This document has no impact on economic regulation. Score: 0

Social Inclusion: This document promotes social inclusion by providing a job to a widow with children. Score: 2
